title: GoldTrend Zeit Warriors 6/17: Golden State Warriors, Elon Musk, World Cup 2026, Vince McMahon, Trump, 'Rehearsal', Drake
itunes:title: GoldTrend Zeit Warriors 6/17: Golden State Warriors, Elon Musk, World Cup 2026, Vince McMahon, Trump, 'Rehearsal', Drake
description:
In this edition of GoldTrend Zeit Warriors, Jack and Miles discuss the conclusion of the NBA Finals, Elon Musk getting sued for pumping and dumping, World Cup 2026, Vince McMahon stepping down as CEO of WWE, Trump admitting his crimes yet again, the new trailer for Nathan Fielder's 'Rehearsal', and Drake's new album.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
